content: the alternating knit and purl rounds until the end of the round 35 sts hat measures 8 /20 cm from the cast-on round 5 *p5 k2tog repeat from * to the edge ending after completing a knit end of the round 30 sts round round 6 *k4 k2tog repeat from * to the end of the round 25 sts round 7 *p3 k2tog repeat from * to the end of the row 20 sts round 8 *k2tog repeat from * to the end of the round 10 sts cut yarn leaving an 8 /20 cm tail thread the tail onto the tapestry needle and pull through the remaining 10 sts to secure weave in ends and steam block 4 | amalgamation beanie ©2025 shaina bilow designs thank you for purchasing this pattern no unauthorized duplication or distribution www shainabilow com @shaina bilow shaina bilow designs
